name: C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc.
description: C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc. is one of the largest logistics and supply chain management companies in the world. Founded in 1905 and headquartered in Eden Prairie, Minnesota, C.H. Robinson specializes in providing freight transportation, logistics solutions, and information services. The company operates through a vast network of transportation carriers and offers a wide range of services, including truckload, less-than-truckload, intermodal, and ocean transportation. With a strong commitment to technology, C.H. Robinson leverages data analytics and innovative software solutions to optimize supply chains and improve efficiency for its clients. The company serves a diverse range of industries, including retail, food and beverage, healthcare, and manufacturing. C.H. Robinson's mission is to connect businesses to the right resources and streamline logistics to help them succeed in a competitive market. With over a century of experience, C.H. Robinson continues to evolve its services to meet the changing demands of the global marketplace, focusing on sustainability and operational excellence.

seo.meta_title: C.H. Robinson Worldwide | Leading Logistics and Supply Chain Management
seo.meta_description: C.H. Robinson Worldwide is a global leader in logistics and supply chain solutions. Explore our services that enhance transportation efficiency and drive business success.

faq.question: What does C.H. Robinson specialize in?
faq.answer: C.H. Robinson specializes in logistics and supply chain management, offering transportation services and technology solutions.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of C.H. Robinson?
faq.answer: Bob Biesterfeld is the CEO of C.H. Robinson Worldwide, Inc.

faq.question: Where is C.H. Robinson headquartered?
faq.answer: C.H. Robinson is headquartered in Eden Prairie, Minnesota, USA.

faq.question: What services does C.H. Robinson offer?
faq.answer: C.H. Robinson offers services including truckload, less-than-truckload, intermodal transportation, supply chain consulting, and technology solutions.
